story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_0100_10: Come on, Paulo! You have to stop doing this!
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_0200_10: Is this really what you wanted?!
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_0300_10: I can’t go back...and I won’t stop.
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_0400_10:
If no one else can do this...if no one else is
willing, then I have no choice but to do it myself!
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_0600_10: If you’re gonna get in my way...
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_0700_10: I won’t hold back, even against all of you!
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_0800_10: Darn it! So we’ve got no choice but to battle him?!
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_0900_10:
Don’t let them team up! Keep them isolated, and
hit each of them hard!
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_1100_10: C’mon! Is that all you got?!
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_1300_10: Hahahahaha! Is that all you can do?!
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_1400_10:
Are the Legendary Pokémon also being affected
by Hoopa’s rampage?!
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_1600_10:
See?! With Hoopa’s power, there’s no way
we’ll lose!
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_1800_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Even you can’t stop us anymore!
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_2200_10:
Let’s retreat. If more of them show up, they’ll be a
pain to deal with.
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_2500_10: Now isn’t the time for us to settle this. Not yet.
story_final_01_02000/2401_1201_2700_10: Until the time is right, just stay out of my way!
